so... are you going to make one for x64 with Japanese & Chinese?
Nice one! Just wanted to know does this has "superfetch" service? If not anyway to re-install it?

@hammer2085
"superfetch" service is there but manual (disabled)
u can start it in control panel>adm tools>services
or task manager > services 

if u don't use ssd os will faster without it.

amazing work

Could you upload the version with Japanese and Chinese?

I work with some obscure Japanese programs for ripping CGs from visual novels, and without Japanese language support I haven't a clue what any of the options mean (I can decently read Japanese and the programs have no English translation)

Wait, scratch that.  I'm not even able to get XP Mode working on the 32-bit version of this.  So unless you can make it work or until I can figure out how to get it to work or some other workaround, you should hold off for now on uploading the x64 lite full with all languages.

It's nothing special, I just really want XP Mode to work and support Japanese characters - heck, I don't even need IE or WMP or anything.  So basically all I'd need is your Win7 64 bit lite v9, but with Japanese and XP Mode support.
Whoops, completely forgot - I'd need the same thing but in 32bit for another PC as well.
